option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.*?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<AnchorPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.treksathi.controllers.LoginController"> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="350.0" prefWidth="500.0" spacing="15.0"> <Label styleClass="title" text="Login to TrekSathi" /> <TextField fx:id="usernameField" promptText="Username" /> <PasswordField fx:id="passwordField" promptText="Password" /> <Button onAction="#handleLogin" text="Login" /> <Label fx:id="statusLabel" /> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="5"> <Label text="Don't have an account yet?" /> <Hyperlink fx:id="signupLink" onAction="#handleSignupLink" text="Sign Up" /> </HBox> <padding> <Insets left="50.0" right="50.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.*?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<AnchorPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.treksathi.controllers.LoginController"> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="350.0" prefWidth="500.0" spacing="15.0"> <Label styleClass="title" text="Login to TrekSathi" /> <TextField fx:id="usernameField" promptText="Username" /> <PasswordField fx:id="passwordField" promptText="Password" /> <Button onAction="#handleLogin" text="Login" /> <Label fx:id="statusLabel" /> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="5"> <Label text="Don't have an account yet?" /> <Hyperlink fx:id="signupLink" onAction="#handleSignupLink" text="Sign Up" /> </HBox> <padding> <Insets left="50.0" right="50.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?> <?import javafx.scene.image.*?>
<top> <HBox spacing="20" style="-fx-background-color: #333;" alignment="CENTER"> xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml" prefWidth="800" prefHeight="600"> <ImageView fitHeight="50" fitWidth="120" styleClass="nav-icon"> <Image url="@/images/logo.jpg"/> <HBox spacing="20" style="-fx-background-color: #333;" alignment="CENTER"> <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/> <Insets right="10"/> <Button fx:id="signupButton" text="SignUp" onAction="#handleSignup" styleClass="nav-btn"/> <ImageView fitHeight="50" fitWidth="120" styleClass="nav-icon"> </HBox> </top> <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS"/> <Button fx:id="bookingDetailsButton" text="Booking Details" onAction="#handleBookingDetails" styleClass="nav-btn"/> <Button fx:id="signupButton" text="SignUp" onAction="#handleSignup" styleClass="nav-btn"/> <Button fx:id="loginButton" text="Login" onAction="#handleLogin" styleClass="nav-btn"/> <padding> <Insets top="20" right="20" bottom="20" left="20"/> </padding> <Label text="Welcome to TrekSathi" style="-fx-font-size: 24px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" /> <Label text="Where every trek begins with a single click." style="-fx-font-size: 16px;" /> <ImageView fitWidth="600" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@/images/FrontpageScene.jpg"/> </ImageView> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Label?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<BorderPane fx:controller="com.treksathi.controllers.WelcomeController" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17" prefWidth="800" prefHeight="600">
<top> <HBox spacing="20" style="-fx-background-color: #333;" alignment="CENTER_RIGHT"> <padding> <Insets top="10" right="10" bottom="10" left="10"/> </padding> <ImageView fitHeight="50" fitWidth="120"> <Image url="@/images/logo.jpg"/> </ImageView> <Button fx:id="bookingDetailsButton" text="Booking Details" onAction="#handleBookingDetails" styleClass="btn-default"/> <Button fx:id="signupButton" text="SignUp" onAction="#handleSignup" styleClass="btn-signup"/> <Button fx:id="loginButton" text="Login" onAction="#handleLogin" styleClass="btn-login"/> </HBox> </top>
<center> <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20"> <padding> <Insets top="20" right="20" bottom="20" left="20"/> </padding> <Label text="Welcome to TrekSathi" style="-fx-font-size: 24px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" /> <Label text="Where every trek begins with a single click." style="-fx-font-size: 16px;" /> <ImageView fitWidth="600" preserveRatio="true"> <Image url="@/images/FrontpageScene.jpg"/> </ImageView> </VBox> </center> </BorderPane>
